chapter.title: Localization features
chapter.simpara: This section demonstrates some specific examples of localized text.

important.para: When evaluating a system for authoring documentation for computer software and hardware, it is important to look carefully at the localization support it provides.

note.para: Through the DocBook XSL Stylesheets, DocBook supports localization in more that 50 languages.

warning.para: You'll have a hard time finding another industry-standard XML-based authoring system that has localization support as thorough as DocBook's.

caution.para: Don't make the mistake of choosing an authoring system that is lacking in internationalization and localization support.

tip.para: Stick with DocBook. You'll be happier that you did.
